scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-ng.ios: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo-ng.android: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-keyboard-toolbar && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin remove nativescript-keyboard-toolbar && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-keyboard-toolbar && tns plugin add ../src
